description: This file defines the BookingsService class for managing bookings via API calls and the Booking data model class, including methods for creating bookings and parsing JSON responses.

classes.name: BookingsService
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods to create bookings through API endpoints.

classes.name: Booking
classes.description: A data model representing a booking, with a factory method to instantiate from JSON data.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Async method to send booking creation request to API and parse the response into a Booking object.

methods.name: Booking.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Booking instance from JSON map.
